version_description:
- Transit Overlay - Ability to overlay current transits over any chart.  Available as an In App Purchase
- Human Design Forecast - see activated channels over the next 24 hours
- Fine tune the Time Travel steps
- Profile available on the chart screen with description.
- Ability to edit existing charts
- Ability to save the chart as an image in your Gallery
- Choose from 45,000 cities 
- Other bug fixes and improvements

- Composite Charts as an In App Purchase
- Russian and Chinese explanations
- Compatibility with iOS11 (64bit)
- Bug fixes

- Return Module, Saturn, Chiron and Solar Returns, Uranus Opposition. Available as In App Purchase.
- Spanish Language
- Bug fixes

- Fully translated app
- Bug fixes
- iPhone X bug fix

- Saturn and Chiron returns calculations use the first return date
- Translation updates
- Minor bug fixes
Fixed "delete" buttons. Updated description font.
Fixed a bug causing the app to crash in some countries.
Updated for iPhone 11. Added Edinburgh.

Added Crosses, Composite Charts description, and Relationship Themes. Removed iCloud sync, new cloud sync coming soon. Fixed bugs.
Tap on "Restore Purchases" in Settings if your In App Purchases don't work.
Natal chart shows Red and Black definitions in Landscape mode. Translated Relationship Themes. Bug fixes.
Natal chart shows Red and Black definitions in Landscape mode. Translated Relationship Themes. Bug fixes.
Natal chart shows Red and Black definitions in Landscape mode. Translated Relationship Themes. Bug fixes.
Bug Fixes.
Fully redesigned city selection. Added 140,000 cities. Bug fixes.
Fully redesigned city selection screen. Bug fixes.
Fixed bugs preventing some charts from loading. Minor updates.
Bug fixes
Fixed a bug with US charts which have full state names. Other bug fixes.
Hebrew, Dutch, Japanese, Portuguese and Turkish translation. Bug fixes.
Chart sync across devices. Bug fixes.
Bug fixes.
Added channel keynotes
Added variable arrows for natal charts. Fixed base calculations. Bug fixes.
Bug fixes. Minor updates.
